a0.speaker: Jane:
a0.dialogue: I know you are going to survive this ordeal. Now, I want you to do one thing.

a1.speaker: Jane:
a1.dialogue: Join me in this heavenly orchestra by drinking this tea. Now, take this.

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: You want me to drink that gross-looking yellow tea? I won't.

a3.speaker: Sakuya:
a3.dialogue: For the love of God, this method only works for those who have slipped on a banana peel.

a4.speaker: Sakuya:
a4.dialogue: So, even if you try this on me, I am definitely not going to join you as I have a lot more business to do.

a5.speaker: Sakuya:
a5.dialogue: But wait a minute... Robots like you don't have a digestive system, no matter how humanoid you look.

a6.speaker: Jane:
a6.dialogue: Don't you know that the digestive system can be synthesized!?
